priority: PRIORITY 1.3: Regulatory Compliance During Gap Period
objective: Document any regulatory issues or violations during gap period

dpor_complaints.notes: DPOR does not provide publicly accessible complaint database. Must submit FOIA request to Information Management Section.

foia_contact.mailing_address: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation, Compliance and Investigations Division, Complaint Analysis & Resolution, 9960 Mayland Drive, Suite 400, Richmond, Virginia 23233-1485

dpor_complaints.complaint_filing_note: Complaints must be submitted in writing within three years of the act, omission, or occurrence

findings.details: BBB complaint: leaks, uncleaned carpets, inadequate management response
Reviews mention noise disturbances, cleanliness problems, management responsiveness issues

alexandria_code_admin.enforces: Virginia Maintenance Code and local ordinances

alexandria_nuisance_hotline.addresses: Trash accumulation, poorly maintained properties, rodent problems

findings.case: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler Management
findings.note: Settlement occurred during gap period but involved DC properties, not VA

findings.violation: Unlawful refusal to accept housing vouchers
findings.significance: Policies directed from top of organization, affecting multiple properties
findings.source: Equal Rights Center press release and complaint

findings.violation: Voucher discrimination found at Kettler properties
findings.significance: Discrimination practices directed from top of organization, not just lower-level employees

search_methods: HUD complaint database (HEMS - not publicly accessible)

hud_database.name: HUD Enforcement Management System (HEMS)
hud_database.note: Documents housing discrimination complaints and investigations but requires official access

bbb_complaints.note: BBB complaints span gap period but exact dates need verification

known_violations_during_gap.case: Equal Rights Center v. Kettler Management

deliverable: Chronological list of regulatory issues during gap period
next_steps: Submit FOIA request to DPOR for complaint records
Expand BBB complaint analysis with dates

metadata.source: Kettler Data Analysis Project - VA DPOR Complaint Research
